mapper.select: SELECT pr.*, m.username FROM product_reviews pr LEFT JOIN member m ON pr.member_id = m.id WHERE pr.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY pr.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_reviews (product_id, member_id, rating, content, is_verified_purchase, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{productId}, #{memberId}, #{rating}, #{content}, #{isVerifiedPurchase}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE product_reviews SET rating = #{rating}, content = #{content}, is_verified_purchase = #{isVerifiedPurchase}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
